column2: "The transfer device should've been right here, but it was destroyed by the debris...Is it because of his revival?"
"There's gotta be another transfer device somewhere."

"ここに転送装置があったはずだけど
ガレキでつぶされているね……
奴の復活の影響か……？"
"別の転送装置がどこかにあるはず。"
"/ci1 2 The transfer device should've been right here, but it was destroyed by the debris...Is it because of his revival?"
"/ci1 2 There's gotta be another transfer device somewhere."

"/ci1 2 ここの転送装置は……
崩落に巻き込まれたか。
まったく、派手に復活してくれるね。"
"/ci2 1 別の転送装置がどこかにあるはず。"
